mapper.sql: DRA_TRAN_NO, ACC_TRAN_NO, PAYEE_BANK_CODE, PAYEE_BRA_BANK_CODE, PAYEE_BRA_BANK_NAME, PAYEE_BANK_ACC_CODE, PAYEE_BANK_ACC_NAME, PAYEE_BANK_ACC_TYPE, STATUS, SUBMIT_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY
mapper.insert:
select to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')||SEQ_TRN_TRANDRAW.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into TCOR_TRN_TRANDRAW (DRA_TRAN_NO, ACC_TRAN_NO, PAYEE_BANK_CODE, PAYEE_BRA_BANK_CODE, PAYEE_BRA_BANK_NAME, PAYEE_BANK_ACC_CODE, PAYEE_BANK_ACC_NAME, PAYEE_BANK_ACC_TYPE, STATUS, SUBMIT_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY) values (#{draTranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accTranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeBraBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeBraBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeBankAccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeBankAccName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeBankAccType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{submitTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update TCOR_TRN_TRANDRAW
PAYEE_BANK_CODE = #{payeeBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYEE_BRA_BANK_CODE = #{payeeBraBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYEE_BRA_BANK_NAME = #{payeeBraBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYEE_BANK_ACC_CODE = #{payeeBankAccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYEE_BANK_ACC_NAME = #{payeeBankAccName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYEE_BANK_ACC_TYPE = #{payeeBankAccType,jdbcType=CHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
SUBMIT_TIME = #{submitTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DRA_TRAN_NO = #{draTranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
